about_the_game:
Need a few decorations to make your maps a little more festive? We’ve got trees, greenery, candles, yard decor and more to make your season brighter.

This holiday tileset includes:

Rugs (includes red plaid, maroon plaid, green plaid and dark green plaid, plus a simple edged rug in red, maroon, green and dark green)
Tables, with red, maroon, green and dark green tablecloths)
Bows (lots of choices)
Wreaths (multiple sizes)
Christmas trees loaded with decorations (two choices)
Greenery (vases, mistletoe, decorated arch, tablescape, etc)
Pompoms (green and red)
Festive light poles (one with sign, one with wreath)
Holiday curtains (red and green, plus detached valance you can use elsewhere)
Yard decor (inflated Santa, snowman)
Nativity
Christmas lights
Strands of ornaments
+ more!

Events/animations include:

Classic Christmas truck (one with tree, one without)
A huge animated snow globe that can hold a character inside
And a sleigh!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games

This holiday tileset includes:

Rugs (includes red plaid, maroon plaid, green plaid and dark green plaid, plus a simple edged rug in red, maroon, green and dark green)
